name: Minesweeper: Retro Fun
description:
Minesweeper is the classic PC game, re-imagined for iPhone and iPad.

Simple to learn and providing hours of fun - the objective of the game is to clear the minefield without hitting any mines!

If you like classic board and puzzle games such as solitaire, sudoku, tetris, chess, checkers, backgammon, nonograms and crosswords then this is the next game for you!

Features
- Retro fun for all ages!
- Simple to learn
- Three difficulty levels
- Improve problem solving and logic skills
